name: incorruptible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
morally strong enough not to be persuaded to do something wrong: Most politicians genuinely believe they are incorruptible.
formal If something is incorruptible, it will not decay or be destroyed: Some people think the soul, unlike the body, is incorruptible.
